text: Pilosocereus fulvilanatus is a species of plant in the family Cactaceae. It is endemic to Brazil. Its natural habitats are subtropical or tropical dry forests, subtropical or tropical dry shrubland, and rocky areas. It is threatened by habitat loss. ==References== ==Sources== * Taylor, N.P. 2002. Pilosocereus fulvilanatus. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species.
